meta.name: Mann Stormlance
meta.source: Michael Mann - California Cup 2025 (1st, Undefeated, 266 players)
meta.note: Reconstructed from tournament reports. ✅ = cache-verified, ⚠️ = web-sourced

units.name: Logan Grimnar
abilities: 1/game: Reserve unit arrives 1 turn early (ANY reserve unit, not just his)
units.notes: Leads WGT x10. Use reserve ability T1 to Deep Strike Terminators early.

units.name: Arjac Rockfist
abilities: 4+ FoD (melee) - led unit fights on death
units.notes: Running SOLO in Mann's list. Charges biggest target independently. Cannot join Logan's WGT (Gate 12: 1 leader max).

units.name: Bjorn the Fell-Handed
abilities: -1 to Wound when S > T (passive durability)
units.notes: Backfield anchor. 5 bonus CP over 5 rounds. Helfrost Cannon for anti-heavy shooting.

units.name: Wolf Priest

enhancement.name: Portents of Wisdom
enhancement.effect: Re-roll Advance rolls for led unit

units.notes: Leads Headtakers in 2000pt list. Enhancement included in 85pts total.

units.name: Lieutenant
abilities: Re-roll Wound rolls of 1 for led unit (shooting + melee)
units.notes: Generic SM unit. Provides wound re-rolls.

units.name: Wolf Guard Terminators (10)
abilities: Storm Shield: W4 instead of W3 (7 models equipped)
units.notes: Logan attached. 7x Storm Shield = 7×4W + 3×3W = 37W total. Deep Strike T2 (or T1 via Logan).

units.name: Wulfen (10)
abilities: OC 0 — CANNOT hold objectives or do actions
units.notes: x2 units. Pure melee hammers. WARNING: OC 0 means they CANNOT score. Use for killing only.

units.name: Thunderwolf Cavalry (6)
units.notes: Flanking unit. 12" move + Advance + Charge under Stormlance = massive threat range.

units.name: Wolf Guard Headtakers
abilities: Select Quarry: Pick 1 enemy CHARACTER, MONSTER, or VEHICLE at start of battle
units.notes: ⚠️ Points web-sourced (not in cache). x2 units. Wolf Priest leads unit 1. Character assassination role.

units.name: Intercessor Squad (5)
units.notes: Generic SM unit. Backfield objective holders.

units.name: Stormraven Gunship
abilities: Hover: Can hover (becomes slower, gains OC)
units.notes: ⚠️ Points web-sourced (not in SM cache). Heavy firepower + transport.

keywords.Deep Strike: Set up in Reserves, arrive 9"+ from enemies
keywords.Deadly Demise X: On death, 6+ = X mortal wounds to units within 6"
keywords.Leader: Attaches to bodyguard unit, wounds go to bodyguards first
keywords.Dev Wounds: Crit Wound = mortals equal to damage, no saves
keywords.Precision: Can allocate wounds to visible CHAR
keywords.Hazardous: After attacks, roll D6 per hazardous wpn used; 1 = 3MW
keywords.Anti-X Y+: Unmod wound Y+ vs keyword X = Crit Wound
keywords.Extra Attacks: Bonus attacks, doesn't replace other melee
keywords.Assault: Can shoot after Advancing (only Assault weapons)
keywords.Pistol: Can shoot in engagement range (only at engaged unit)
keywords.Grenades: Unit can use Grenade stratagem (D6 S4 AP0 Dmg1 Blast at 6")
keywords.Smoke: Unit can use Smokescreen stratagem (-1 to Hit vs this unit)
keywords.Lance: +1 to Wound if unit made a Charge move this turn
keywords.Heavy: -1 to Hit if unit moved (unless VEHICLE/MONSTER)
keywords.Blast: +1 attack per 5 models in target unit

factionRule.effect: Start of Cmd phase: pick 1 enemy unit. RR Hit rolls vs that unit. DIVERGENT: Space Wolves get re-roll hits ONLY (no +1 to wound).

command.text: BJORN +1 CP: Automatic every Command phase. 5 bonus CP over 5 rounds.
OATH OF MOMENT: Pick the scariest enemy unit. ALL your units re-roll hit rolls vs it (shooting AND melee). DIVERGENT: hits only, NOT +1 wound.
WOLF PRIEST RESURRECT: Bring back 1 dead Headtaker (not characters). Great for keeping assassination squad alive.
LOGAN EARLY RESERVES (once/game): Any reserve unit arrives 1 turn early. Terminators can Deep Strike T1!

movement.text: STORMLANCE RULE: Every unit can Advance and still charge. Also can charge after Falling Back. THIS IS YOUR WHOLE ARMY'S THING — USE IT.
DEEP STRIKE: Logan + 10 Terminators arrive 9"+ from enemies. With Logan's T1 ability, you can alpha strike before opponent is ready.
TWC FLANKING: 12" move + Advance (D6") + Charge = ~24" threat range. Flank around enemy and hit backfield.
RIDE HARD RIDE FAST (1CP): Give TWC or Stormraven +2" Move and +2" Advance. Extends threat range.
WULFEN OC WARNING: Both Wulfen units have OC 0. They CANNOT score objectives. Position them to KILL, not to hold.

shooting.text: OATH TARGET: Re-roll ALL hits against your chosen target. Prioritize shooting at that unit first.
STORMRAVEN FIREPOWER: Twin Multi-melta (S9 AP-4 D6 Melta 2), Twin Heavy Plasma (S8/9 AP-3/-4 D2/3), Hurricane Bolters (24 shots). Point at priority target.
BJORN: Helfrost Cannon A3 S8 AP-3 D3 at 24". Good anti-heavy chip damage.
BLITZING FUSILLADE (1CP): If unit Advanced, ranged gets [ASSAULT] + hit on 3+. Good for TWC or Wulfen with pistols.

charge.text: STORM OF VIOLENCE (1CP): Declare on a charging unit. Their melee crit hits (6s) generate 1 extra hit each. HUGE on Terminators with 40+ attacks.
TWC THUNDEROUS CHARGE: On charge turn, Wolf Guard Weapons become S6 AP-3 (instead of S5 AP-2). Much deadlier.
WULFEN BERSERK CHARGE: +1A and +1S on charge. Thunder Hammers go to S11 with 4 attacks each.
LIGHTNING ASSAULT (1CP): Unit that Fell Back gets +2 to Charge. Combined with Stormlance, Fall Back and charge same turn at +2.
ARJAC SOLO CHARGE: Point Arjac at the scariest CHAR or MONSTER. Full re-roll hits and wounds. Foehammer S8 AP-2 D3 Precision.

fight.text: OATH TARGET MELEE: Still re-rolling all hits in melee vs Oath target. Focus your best attackers on it.
PACK HUNTERS (1CP): If another SW unit is also engaged with same enemy, get +1 to Wound. Gang up on targets.
WOLF PRIEST +1 WOUND: Headtakers get +1 to Wound melee. Paired MC Power Weapons wound Marines on 3+.
HEADTAKER ASSASSINATION: vs Quarry target, attacks gain [Devastating Wounds] + [Precision]. Point at enemy warlord.
TERMINATOR DURABILITY: -1 to Wound when S > T. Enemy S8 weapons wound on 4+ instead of 3+. Very tanky.
ARJAC VS CHAR/MONSTER: Full re-roll hits AND wounds. Foehammer at Precision. Kills enemy characters dead.

endOfTurn.text: SCORE OBJECTIVES: Check Primary + Secondary. Intercessors and TWC are your OC scorers. Wulfen CANNOT score (OC 0).
STORMRAVEN HOVER: If grounded, gains OC. Consider hovering late game for objective play.
